short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets rid of the post score, ranking, time posted, and subreddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surfing reddit without the bias! Deleting all outside influence of communities, Deleddit allows you surf reddit with the feeling of independence from upvotes, subreddit time, and tier scores for free enjoyment. Judge the content by your own interests instead of the communities!
